Home.badge: V 1.0 Beta: Fewer bugs now (we think)
Home.heroTitle: Online events that finally don't suck.
Home.heroSubtitle: No video. No voice. No pretending you're listening. Just pixel avatars, controlled chaos, and a 5% chance we'll ignore you on purpose.
Home.problemText: Your face is tired. Your bandwidth is suffering. People fall asleep with their eyes open. Current event platforms are boring, heavy, and force you to comb your hair.
Home.problemXDesc: Nobody wants to see you eat snacks in HD.
Home.problemCheckDesc: Join, move, fight, leave. No hassle.
Home.featuresSubtitle: We removed everything that's in the way. What's left is pure functional nostalgia.
Home.feature1Desc: A 2D map where you're a bunch of pixels. Walk toward others to "socialize" or run to a corner. Simplicity is the new immersion.
Home.feature2Desc: Request your turn to speak. Advanced queue system with a special "feature": 5% chance the system will ignore you and you'll have to try again.
Home.feature3Desc: Networking boring? Get too close to someone and a random quick battle triggers. Gain social XP (and enemies).
Home.feature4Desc: Someone annoying? Send them to "Punishment Corner". Their avatar gets frozen with a dunce cap visible to everyone before the final Ban.
Home.howItWorksTitle: From chaos to order in 3 steps
Home.step1Desc: Set date, time and pick the map (Office Dungeon or 8-bit Beach). You get a unique link.
Home.step2Desc: Attendees validate their ticket, pick their pixel skin and appear in the lobby. No install required.
Home.step3Desc: You're god. Give the floor, mute everyone or hand out shame caps with one click.
Home.pricingSubtitle: Pay a little now before we go corporate and boring.
